shortdesc.ph: Callback when a local video mixing error occurs.
Callback when a local video compositing error occurs.
Callback for local video mixing error.
Callback for local video transcoding error.

p.codeblock: public virtual void OnLocalVideoTranscoderError(TranscodingVideoStream stream, VIDEO_TRANSCODER_ERROR error){}

section.p: When or fails, the SDK triggers this callback to report the reason for the mixing failure.
This callback is triggered by the SDK when or fails, reporting the reason for the compositing failure.
When calling or fails, the SDK triggers this callback to report the reason for the mixing failure.
When or fails, the SDK triggers this callback to report the reason for the failure.
